[`pip install allowed-ghosts`](https://pypi.org/project/allowed-ghosts/)2. Add `allowed-ghosts` to your [`requirements.txt`](requirements.txt)3. Edit your [`settings.py`](core/settings.py) ```py from allowed_ghosts import ALLOWED_GHOSTS ALLOWED_HOSTS = ["localhost"] ALLOWED_HOSTS += ALLOWED_GHOSTS ```4.
